website_summaries.verdict: This Kirby plushie looks like he jumped straight out of Dream Land, is a fairly inexpensive toy, and was expertly crafted.
pros: Super-soft, fuzzy, and squishy little plushie
Looks exactly like he does in the games
Kirby easily stands on his feet
Sweet Kirby toy for all ages

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since my first Kirby game on the Gameboy, I have been absolutely in love with this little critter (he? she? it?)! It never dawned on me until recently, that I should actually buy some Kirby merchandise- and I settled on this little dude. Wonderful quality and craftsmanship- he is very soft yet study enough to not look semi-deformed and deflated. I honestly want to go and buy 10 of them, only to place them randomly around the house. Absolutely adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Yay Kirby!
customer_reviews.text: I love Kirby. I named my puppy Kirby so I had to get this for him. It's a soft plush toy that is durable enough for him to chew on. Everyone needs one or two Kirby's in their home!!
customer_reviews.author: BBPhrogger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kirby Plush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kirby plush. The shape and quality is perfect. Kirby also has beads in his feet to help him stand upright. I would recommend this plush to anyone who loves Kirby. This plush and the Sanei brand plush are the same. It's produced by Sanei and distributed by Little Buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay too Cute!❤️ ❤️ ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year olds review: "This Kirby plush is so cute! I bought him 3 years ago, and he still looks brand new! This plush is so cute, that my little brother just had to buy one of his own! Kirby has just the cutest smile, and looks just like his video game counterpart, and I love how he stands up on his own, it makes him perfect for display! Even if you have other Kirby power-up plushies, no collection is complete without the adorable and sweet, classic Kirby!"
customer_reviews.author: Vampire D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Kirby loving five year old for his birthday. It's exactly as described and my son LOVES his Kirby. Perfect for sleeping with at night and carrying in a backpack during the day. It's almost a year and it has held up great. Would recommend for all Kirby lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my kids love kirby!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are crazy about this toy! I have no idea what is the appeal but they want it and they are happy with it so I guess I am happy. Lol! It is made sturdy though which is a plus and easy to clean (we know because my son accidentally throw it in the trash with nasty stuff in it and he just wiped the part that was stained and it looked good as new again).
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this Kirby, because another seller was taking it's time to deliver the first one even though it said Prime. It turns out, this one became her favorite. My daughter also got it really dirty and I was able to clean it off. Great little plushie!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Darling

customer_reviews.title: Kirby!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this little toy packs a huge punch! My just turned 4 year old is obsessed with playing Kirby - Return to Dreamland, Epic Yarn - all the Kirby games! He so badly wanted a Kirby toy. This one is so simple, yet it makes him so happy!! It was his favorite gift he received for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Leeshie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is seriously cute. It was one of my son's favorite Christmas presents this year. It's very soft and squishy, but retains its shape well. The little beads in the feet help it stay upright, which is great. The instructions say it's washable, too, which I appreciate. Overall, this was definitely a hit and I imagine will be carried around for months to come. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Joseph

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: this kirby was perfect for my son! he loves kirby and this was super soft and squishy! its held its shape very well considering my son plays with it all the time and never lets it go
customer_reviews.author: C. Aguinaga

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This plush Kirby is absolutely adorable. My daughter loves it. I've purchased other Little Buddy products, and this shows the same quality and craftsmanship as those items do. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Dale R.Top Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gf as a Christmas present and she was so happy and treats him like our son. Made her really happy and is a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My Eight year old loves his Kirby plush. It's been thru a lot of play and is still intact. It is on the smaller side, but my kids tend to prefer smaller plush toys over larger ones and this one is perfect. My son wanted me to add that it is "super duper duper hard to rip"...lol.
customer_reviews.author: xochitl09

customer_reviews.title: Bought As Christmas Gift for Friend
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a friend who like the Kirby franchise, its not too big but small enough to fit on his desk as an ornament. Good price for size and softness.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lanphear

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: 8 year-old bought this himself and is so pleased with his order. My guys have tons of the Pokemon, Paw Patrol and SpongeBob characters and they're all approximately that 6" size. Well made, colors are very true to what my computer shows, and he'll wash well just like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: A good boy
customer_reviews.text: He’s a handsome little dude. Stitches are well-done and fabric is soft and unwrinkled. Great detailing on eyes and mouth. Now Kirby can come with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hood

customer_reviews.title: Kirby is well made 😊
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this little plush Kirby. This is a very simple plush toy that stands well by it’s self. Very cute and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, is soft and have a nice quality, I only was thinking that was a little bigger. So only be sure than check very well the size before buy it. For don't have inconveniences.
customer_reviews.author: Mayreli Cuevas.

customer_reviews.title: Kirby is his usual puffy self
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend as a birthday gift, and she is in love with it! She's an avid collector of plush products, and this Little Buddy Kirby is her absolute favorite out of all she owns. He is soft, round, plump and cuddly as all heck. He even has little beads in his feet to help him stand upright! A quality, adorable plush.
customer_reviews.author: Protoman

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was a happy boy. So happy he made the granddaughter want ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was a happy boy. So happy he made the granddaughter want one, so now they each have their own.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and exactly what I expected per the product description. My 7-year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Nephews love it! Kind of small, but they do let you know of that before you buy. Very plushy!
customer_reviews.author: J Duncan

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a stuffie my son bought with his chore money. He is very happy and brings it with him often
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Poyo!
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a nice wall decoration using the built-in plastic hook. A good choice for any Kirby fan!
customer_reviews.author: RichterEX2

customer_reviews.title: the cuteness SUCKS you in
customer_reviews.text: A fun little gift for my brother who, to this day at 25 yo, still loves Kirby haha
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute little toy, nothing much more to say. It came in good condition, the stitching was solid and it feels soft. Perfect cute little gift
customer_reviews.author: eviltwin

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old loves this Kirby! She sleeps with him. Soft and no bad odors.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid K.

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit picky with plush toys, and this Kirby plush is genuinely the most I could ask for! Looks great, great quality, good size, and can stand up on its own! This plush is almost as great as my love for the rotund pink boy. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Chafe

customer_reviews.title: It’s great !!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great got it for my son he loved it , clean soft and packaged good
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Keep this little guy on display. He is so cute and kids that visit love him, and he takes a beating! Kirby can take it.
customer_reviews.author: MissMtoP

customer_reviews.title: My autistic grandson just loves this toy.
customer_reviews.text: My autistic grandson lost his plushy and it was terrible until I could get this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for me and my son ended up taking it! Durable and soft as well as cute
customer_reviews.author: Clumsy introvert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase it for as a gift and now I'm seriously thinking about get one for myself, it's such a cute little Kirby Plush, i just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It doesn’t look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This kirby plush brought happiness to my life. At first I thought I lived in a void of never ending despair until I purchased this kirby!!!! I am happy for the first time in almost 2 decades. A swell guy I am truly thankful for his service. May Kirby Bless America.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable plush that is well made. Note that it is small, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MomofDragons

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Kirby lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Got as gift for my daughter’s friend! Can’t wait to give it to him!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this so much! It was a great gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves this. It is very durable and still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Made my son so happy to add to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable! Everything is perfectly colored, it’s extremely soft, comes with an official tag, I love it! It’s a gift... but I should’ve bought myself one too lol. Thought it would’ve been a bit bigger though, I expected volleyball size, but this is okay too. It’s adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot Tore After One Day
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for my 7 yr old, but the foot on the plushie tore after only one day of playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Timpani Treat-puckett

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it, my only complaint is that it’s overpriced for a small plush toy. Should cost no more than $6 - $7.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Anime

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves Kirby and was very happy with this plush. Great quality and craftsmanship. Does not look generic at all. (Phew. Who likes generic plushies?...)
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, whom LOVES Kirby. It's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: Soft and a good size
customer_reviews.text: Super cute stuffed Kirby. My son’s going to love it. (:
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo takes kirby everywhere with him! He was so happy to get him as a birthday present and told us for weeks how this kirby plush was his favorite birthday present. Total win.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Item just as described!
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about this product! (Little Buddy Kirby Adventure All Star Collection 5.5" Kirby Stuffed Plush) The size is small enough to take along on our adventures and the quality of Kirby is great! Happy to have made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kellan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Stuffed Kirby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little Kirby for my son for Christmas, and although he hasn't opened his presents yet, I know he's going to love it! This little, stuffed Kirby is well made and is absolutely adorable. I would definitely recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Zort

customer_reviews.title: Kirby
customer_reviews.text: A gift that any Kirby enthusiast would love! A cute, soft, cuddly Kirby plushie.
customer_reviews.author: Lea K

customer_reviews.title: Very Plush and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for myself because I'm a long-time Kirby fan and I have to say this is a good addition to my room! Definitely soft and worth $10 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Kirby
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little creature that my 5yr old absolutely loves. It's perfectly plushy and the feet have a heavier feel to them which keeps Kirby upright. I've already washed this item and it's withstood a washing and my 5yr old thus far. Good material, very soft, well made. great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Satske

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Soft + Durable Plush, gave this as a gift to a friend and he said he liked it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Pink and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. He has weighted feet with beads that keep him upright for display.

customer_reviews.title: He has quickly become one of my son's favorite plushies.
customer_reviews.text: Kirby is made extremely well. He has quickly become one of my son's favorite plushies.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s good it sits there as a decoration and stuff animal but it’s soft

customer_reviews.title: poyo
customer_reviews.text: he came in good condition when he arrived in the mail.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft boi
customer_reviews.text: kirby is such a wholesome little being, the product was soft and loveable and made an incredible gift to a friend who has loved kirby since we were young. 11/10 very polite and soft
customer_reviews.author: Landon S

customer_reviews.title: Great Kirby Plush!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Kirby and this is the perfect little stuffed toy for him to carry around. Arrived quickly, clean, and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: As a Kirby fan, I just had to get this, and I'm satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Kirby plush as a birthday gift, very satisfied with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Cute soft Kirby
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves Kirby and this was just perfect. So soft and very well made.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and accurate Kirby plush
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable and accurate to the photo. My son loved it and has played and slept with it every night since he received it in June 2018. One of his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: ACastillo

customer_reviews.title: Cute plushie
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my daughters bday. She loves Kirby and loves this plush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little guy, simple, nothing fancy other than the fact that he's KIRBY! My son and I love him
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, well made, soft, KIRBY all that you need. He's smallish, we knew that and specifically wanted a smaller one, just keep that in mind. Maybe the size of a large grapefruit, just a little bigger than that I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: William Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these as gifts. They both look just like the picture and are very soft. It’s a little bigger than a softball.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material, looks adorable. Product description is accurate, and it is indeed about 5" tall.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft kirby plush
customer_reviews.text: It's an adorable soft kirby plush toy. Really worth the price and much loved by a 5 year old boy.

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would of been bigger but still made a good gift

customer_reviews.title: Kirby!

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then picture presents
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than presented in pic, it’s the size of a softball. But my son still is happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, and cuddly.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cute. It's heavier than I expected, because it has beans in it's feet to help it stand. It is very durable, having survived 3 attacks from my cat. I would definitely recommend to any Kirby fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Kirby picures!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Soft! Hes nice and round and great for snuggles or display! The feet have beans in it and the body has stuffing, so it stands up very will!
customer_reviews.author: Holly James

customer_reviews.title: For my Friend
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my friend. It's a little small but if you have a friend who loves Kirby then get this for them. If you like Kirby, then get it too!
customer_reviews.author: Medkit

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!😄💕
customer_reviews.text: I just thought it was supposed to be a little bit bigger but I guess I didn’t read the dimensions right. But it’s super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce S.

customer_reviews.title: Nana this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter fell in love with her buddy Kirby. Out of all the many, many Christmas presents she received, most a lot more expensive, she said, "Nana this is my favorite".
customer_reviews.author: J Britto

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes Kirby. The doll is so soft that my daughter is sleeping every night. I am happy to purchase at a very reasonable price. Shipping is also fast.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: Really cute Kirby plush. Well made. My 5 year old son loves him

customer_reviews.title: Kirby is the best
